item.title: Sublime â€“ Use Control+W to delete Word to the left
item.description: I’m a pretty big fan of Sublime Text (v3), will blog more about my setup details. But this morning i really missed the Control+W to delete the first word on the left side, so i found this Solution: Sublime Text -> Preferences -> Key Bindings - User: 1 2 3 [ { "keys": ["ctrl+w"], "command": "delete_word", "args": {"forward": false, "sub_words": true}}, ] An that’s it, you can now delete words with Control+W ðŸ™‚

item.title: FTP Server under Mac OS X
item.description: Today a colleague of mine (Thanks Alex Passfall) showed me a simple ftp server under mac: 1 2 pip install twisted # if not already sudo twistd -n ftp -p 21 -r Downloads After that you can access all the files in the specified directory through ftp. Awesome stuff! 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 aci-lab-as01#copy ftp://10.32.32.184/file.lic . Destination filename [file.lic]? Accessing ftp://10.32.32.184/file.lic... Loading file.
